text: The Marshall Islands have competed in two Olympic Games. They first competed at the 2008 Summer Olympics. They also competed in the 2010 Winter Olympics. They have not won any Olympic medals. In their first Olympics, they had 5 athletes compete in 3 different sports. ==The Marshall Islands at the Summer Olympics== Games Athletes Athletes by sport Athletes by sport Athletes by sport Athletes by sport Athletes by sport Athletes by sport Athletes by sport Athletes by sport Athletes by sport Athletes by sport Games Athletes Beijing 2008 5 2 2 1 ==References== Category:Marshall Islands category:Nations at the Olympics
title: Marshall Islands at the Olympics
